CustomField.description: This field is used by the BatchtoCalculateAnnualRevenue batch process to determine whether to include 'Tail/Run-Off' and 'BOR’d Away' revenue when calculating annual revenue for this account.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Select this checkbox to include 'Tail/Run-Off' and 'BOR’d Away' revenue in the annual revenue calculation for this account.
CustomField.label: Include BOR and Tail Revenue
